Articles.Content: EDS, rocket parts dealer, occasional focus on the news (Particularly the failures and bankruptcies], and rocket seller. It all began as a small operation, outside of a garage based in- oh, right, ever since the Great Kanawha Collision of last week, our records have been lost. Well, either way, we started selling parts to rocketry clubs and, every few weeks, a small nation launching a 'weather' satellite. And then we sorta dabbled in building Eastons... Yeah, those rockets with a large string of failures during the early days of the KSP? We did that, not good for PR though, so keep it quiet.
